channel.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows PT 2 - This Friday
channel.description: I can not wait for HARRY POTTER tonight or as some say "tommorow". I'm going to be going there with elder wand Lol. I FUCKING LOVE, HARRY POTTER, RON, HERMOINE, LUNA or something. I don't remeber how to spell harmoniy's name Lol. Post here if you like harry potter too, We can fight about some other movies. I know a topic about movies was posted but i love harry potter too much and this is the last one. I'm probably gonna cry my eyes out and threaten J.K Rowling to make her make a new one :D. List Of Spells: [code]Accio Charm Summons an object Alohomora Charm Opens locked objects Aparecium Spell Reveals invisible ink Avada Kadavra Curse Murders opponent Unforgivable Avifors Charm Turns small objects into birds. Avis Spell Launches birds from your wand Crucio Curse Tortures opponent Unforgivable Confundus Charm Used to confuse opponent Conjunctivitis Curse Damages opponents eyesight Deletrius Spell Counters "Prior Incatato" Densaugeo Spell Enlarges Teeth Diffindo Spell Splits seams Dissendium Spell Opens "One eyed witch" hump Engorgio Charm Enlarges and item Ennervate Spell Counters Stupefy Expecto Patronum Charm Creates a Patronus Expelliarmus Charm Disarms your opponent Ferula Spell Creates bandages Fidelius Charm Hides a secret within someone Finite Incantatum Spell Stops any current spells Flipendo Jinx Knocks an object backwards Furnunculus Curse Produces boils on opponent Homorphus Charm Lockhart's Werewolf "cure" Immobulus Charm Renders target immobile. Impedimenta Charm Slows an advancing object Imperio Curse Controls a person Unforgivable Impervius Charm Makes an object repel water Incendio Spell Starts a fire Legilimens Spell Allows the caster to delve into the mind of the victim Locomotor Mortis Curse Locks opponents legs Lumos Spell Creates light at wand tip Mobiliarbus Charm Moves objects with wand Mobilicorpus Spell Moves unconscious bodies Morsmorde Spell Conjures the Dark Mark Nox Spell Counter to Lumos Obliviate Charm Erases memories Orchideous Spell Conjures a bunch of flowers Petrificus Totalus Spell Body - Bind Point Me Charm Wand acts like a compass Priori Incantatum Spell Result when brother wands duel Prior Incantato Spell Reveals a wands last spell / cast Protego Charm Cause spells to reflect back to the sender. [/code] NEVER EVER [img]https://www.moparisthebest.com/Themes/core/images/icons/quick_lock.gif[/img] this topic! ( got the definations of spells from site )

item.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows PT 2 - This Friday
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Jc22493, post:77, topic:404143”][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=501200.msg3673243#msg3673243 date=1311083168]

What is an edler wand?

are you kidding, Your making me cry now. It’s the wand that voldmort had in pt 1-2 and dumbledoor in the others, Harry got it at the end but threw it down.

Holy shit your spelling of the names is horrendous. It’s Voldemort, Dumbledore and to top it off it’s the Elder Wand not the edler wand…

Also something funny, I noticed Voldemort and Dumbledore where on the spellcheck LOL
[/quote]
since we’re on the topic of spelling, were*[/quote]
Pfft… oh you…

Read full topic

I was playing around yesterday and you know the one that unlocks doors? I did that on the door and it opened i was freaking out until my grandma walked in, she was the one to open the door :D.
[/quote]
[/quote]
No shit sherlock. Ofc I am a wizard how would I know all this, I killed harry and got the edler wand.
I watched in 3d too.
To bad I’m only 74 mage :D.

item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

CoonHunter:

Gf went to see it with her friend and ruined out date. Probably wont be going to see it.

I feel yeah, 1st time (Day after release) I was going with girlfriend but grand parents come in that day and she has to see it blah blah blah, I allready had the tickets so i watched with some friends in 3d, Next day… I go to watch it again with her (none 3d) and yeah was better then 3d could stay focused idk if it was that or cause I was hella sleepy that other day l0l.

Read full topic
